action.action-desc: Mrs. Spartz introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to repeal the Obamacare ban on provider-owned hospitals, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Restoring Rights of Physicians to Own Hospitals Act.

section.header: Repealing requirements for hospitals to qualify for rural provider and hospital exception to ownership or investment prohibition
